trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som håndterer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> hendelsen oppstår av visuell utformingsverktøy, for eksempel [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementering av <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ViewEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en ViewEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>denne hendelsen oppstår ved designer verten for visse handlinger på en kontroll i utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a ViewEventHandler delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>hendelsen behandles av en ViewEventHandler representantmetode, som tar en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektet som en parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a ViewEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis kontrollen designer klasser ikke direkte implementere eller tilordne en ViewEventHandler-representant.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>basisklassen leverer standard representant for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert kontroll utviklere overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metoder for å behandle disse hendelser for kontrollen i utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>metoden angir standard hendelsen representanten for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>delegere.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>
